topics.body:
I have a dumb question; I was looking back on past events in geek culture and I noticed something odd about how the media portrays geeks:
2000 mass media: "Geeks are a bunch of violent potential Columbine shooters"
2001 mass media: "Geeks are a bunch of basement dwellers"
2002 mass media: "Geeks are a bunch of basement dwellers"
2003 mass media: "Geeks are a bunch of basement dwellers"
2004 mass media: "Geeks are a bunch of basement dwellers"
2005 mass media: "Geeks are a bunch of basement dwellers"
2006 mass media: "Why are we losing so much traction on internet media sourcs?"
2007 mass media: "Lol the cake is a lie!  Le epic memes bro!"


What happened in 2007?
